chime.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a bell or clock chimes, it makes a ringing sound, especially to tell you what time it is
chime.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The clock in the hall chimed six.
chime.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to be the same as something else or to have the same effect
